overview: A filmed play by Switchers, a group of young actors from Hackney, London and Mid Powys, Wales, Acorn takes inspiration from the world and characters in Octavia Butlerâ€™s novel Parable of the Talents. It explores scenes from the near future, of a group of people living together in a small farming community that struggles to survive within a world of economic and ecological breakdown and authoritarianism.
title: Acorn
